content: a strap that s about 13 inches long from end to end you can chain more or less before slip stitching to make the strap length to your liking weave strap through the chain 2 holes around the top of the bag making sure both ends are coming out of the same space before sewing the ends of the strap together after sewing the ends of the strap together knot the two strands of yarn together well and weave in yarn ends alternative method for weaving the strap instead of weaving in and out of the ch2 spaces loop the strap around each space going in the same direction  see photo left 5
